name: Yeguang's Research Toolbox
body:
## Welcome to Yeguang's Research Toolbox
This simple toolbox contains codes/scripts/libraries/data used in my own daily research life. The tools cover a variety of fields including finite element simulation, data processing, visualization, linux/windows os managements. Feel free to download/use/modify for your own research or other purposes.

## Catalog

### Python Scripts for ABAQUS
* [Python scripts for materials](https://github.com/blackholexyg/research-toolbox/tree/master/AbaqusMaterials)

### Matlab Codes
* [Data plots](https://github.com/blackholexyg/research-toolbox/tree/master/MatlabDataProcessing)

## Contact
Found a problem? You are welcome to report bugs to [Yeguang](http://blackholexyg.github.io/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
